header.note:
This TMX file is the master repository for the English labels used in the Twetailer application. The content is edited by the developers who generate the unique identifiers, the notes for the translators, the label/message to be displayed, and custom tags used by the build system.
This is the unique repository containing: - Information used by the browser-part of the application (dojo tech stack), - Information used by the webtier-part of the application (Java tech stack), - Information used by the layout system (Java tech stack in 7.1-can be pushed dojo-side later).
This TMX is submitted to the translation department and this entity returns many others TMX files, as many as languages required for the product.
Labels and messages defined in this TMX files and its localized versions are published at build time: - As properties files to be handled by the PropertiesResourceBundle class, - As JavaScript files defining simple maps. The target type is chosen thanks to the custom property:
Note to developers: 1) When the usage of one label occurs many time, don't hesitate to define many entries if you think that the context is different. 2) If the usage of the custom tags is important for the build process, giving information to the translators via the tag is also very important for the overall quality of the product. Don't hesitate to link entries if the labels/messages are related. Don't hesitate to give samples to illustrate your comments. 3) Be sure to generate unique identifiers. Be consistent the unique identifier format. 4) All text inserted in the tag is rendered as is. Take care of the return-to-line and spacing.
IMPORTANT NOTES: 1) Everything rendered between the tags and are rendered. So be careful to NOT insert return-to-line or extra spaces. 2) Forbidden characters are : ampersand, quotes, double-quotes, less-than. and greater-than signs Their unicode value MUST be used in place: - ampersand: \u0026 - double quotes: \u0022 - less than: \u003c - greater than: \u003e - non break space: \u00a0 Note that using th single quote is safe. 3) All messages being displayed in a Web browser, it's possible to use HTML sequences, but they MUST be escaped correctly: "" should become: "\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e". Other HTML codes (like —) are safe as the corresponding UTF-8 sequence.

tu.note: IMPORTANT: Native transcription of the language (e.g. Dansk, Deutsch, English).| IMPORTANT: "English" should not be just translated!| IMPORTANT: If the rest of the xml:lang attribute is left with the value "en", it's crucial to update the one of this entry with the correct value (e.g. fr, it, zh_CN, etc.).

Just an entry made available for the unit tests.| To enhance the reading of this document converted to HTML, insert a trailing pipe sign at the end of a paragraph to force a return-to-line to be inserted.| Otherwise, the text is rendered one one line (the browser will wrapped the text).

This is the master list of help keywords.| Each value are separated by a comma from other.| Each value identifies an additional TMX unit, with the prefix 'help_keyword_equivalents_'| IMPORTANT: note the case of the keyword MUST be the same as the value of the tuid attribute into the lexicon TMX file.
For the Twitter adapter, message sent to non followers.| {0} is the sender screen name.

tuv.seg: @{0} To protect your privacy, Follow Twetailer and then send your request via Direct Messages - like 'd twetailer ...'

body.tu:
javarb Report an unexpected error while processing the raw command.| {0}: raw command key| {1}: an optional information, in English only.
The System encountered an unexpected error! {1}| If your issue cannot be fixed with another message, please report the error with the incident identifier: 323-{0}.

tu.note: Error message generated when the given action is not recognized.| {0}: action label

tuv.seg: The Action {0} is not recognized by the System. Send '!help action' for the list of available actions.

tu.note: Error message generated when the given action is not allowed by the user's profile.| {0}: action label

tuv.seg: The Action {0} is not allowed by your profile. Send '!help {0}' for the list of available actions.
The Cancel command requires a Demand Reference. Send '!help cancel' for more information.
The Demand identifier specified with the Cancel Command is invalid.

tu.note: {0}: demand key| {1}: demand state

tuv.seg: The Cancel Command has no effect of the Demand reference:{0} being in the state:{1}.
The Proposition identifier specified with the Cancel Command is invalid.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal state

tuv.seg: The Cancel Command has no effect of the Proposal reference:{0} being in the state:{1}.
The Demand identifier specified with the Close Command is invalid.

tu.note: {0}: demand key| {1}: demand state

tuv.seg: The Close Command has no effect of the Demand reference:{0} being in the state:{1}.

tu.note: {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: Thank you for closing Demand reference:{0}. Twetailer will update everyone's Ratings shortly. | Looking forward to the next opportunity where we can broker Consumer Demand with local Retailers' available Supply - via tweets, for f(r)ee. | Regards, The Twetailer Community.

tu.note: {0}: demand key| {1}: proposal key

tuv.seg: Demand reference:{0} has been closed by the Consumer. | In order to improve your Twetailer Rating, please remember to finalize your Proposal by sending ... | \u0022d twetailer !close proposal:{1}\u0022, or, \u0022d twetailer !flag proposal:{1} note:[enter your issue here]\u0022
The Proposition identifier specified with the Close Command is invalid.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal state

tuv.seg: The Close Command has no effect of the Proposal reference:{0} being in the state:{1}.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key

tuv.seg: Thank you for closing Proposal:{0}. Twetailer will update everyone's Ratings shortly. | Looking forward to the next opportunity where we can broker Consumer Demand with local Retailers' available Supply - via tweets, for f(r)ee. | Regards, The Twetailer Community.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: demand key

tuv.seg: Proposal:{0} has been closed by the Retailer. | In order to improve your Twetailer Rating, please remember to finalize your Demand by sending ... | \u0022d twetailer !close ref:{1}\u0022, or, \u0022d twetailer !flag ref:{1} note:[enter your issue here]\u0022
Only Proposals or Demands can be closed. Check '!help close' for more information.
The Proposition identifier specified with the Confirm Command is invalid.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: demand key| {2}: demand state

tuv.seg: The Demand reference:{1} is not in a state ({2}) that allows the Proposition proposal:{0} confirmation.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: demand key| {2}: demand tags| {3}: store key {4}: store name

tuv.seg: Thank you for confirming Proposal:{0} for Demand ref:{1}, tags:{2} | Store:{3}, {4} will be notified and asked to keep you Demand, marked with ref:{1}, on the side for you. | Send \u0022d twetailer !list store:{3}\u0022 for more details | In order to improve your Twetailer Rating, please remember to finalize your Demand after visiting the store by sending ... | \u0022d twetailer !close ref:{0}\u0022, or, \u0022d twetailer !flag ref:{0} note:[enter your issue here]\u0022

tu.note: {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal tags| {2}: demand key

tuv.seg: Confirming Proposal:{0} Tags:{1} | Please prepare product:{2} by marking it with Demand ref:{2} and placing it on the side.| In order to improve your Twetailer Rating, please remember to finalize your Proposal after the Consumer has visited your store by sending ... | \u0022d twetailer !close ref:{2}\u0022, or, \u0022d twetailer !flag ref:{2} note:[enter your issue here]\u0022
The Proposition identifier specified with the Confirm Command is invalid.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key

tuv.seg: Now that Proposal:{0} has been declined, you won't be notified about any related updates.
The Proposition identifier specified with the Decline Command is invalid.
Only Proposals or Demands can be declined. Check '!help decline' for more information.

tu.note: {0}: demand key {1}: demand state

tuv.seg: The Delete action can only be applied to Demands in the state:cancelled. Your Demand reference:{0} is in the state:{1}.| Please cancel the proposition first with '!cancel reference:{0}'. Check '!help delete' for more information.

tu.note: {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: That Demand reference:{0} has been marked for deletion. It will be garbage collected in a near future. In the meanwhile, it is no more accessible.
The Proposition identifier specified with the Delete Command is invalid.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key {1}: proposal state

tuv.seg: The Delete action can only be applied to Proposals in the state:cancelled. Your Proposal:{0} is in the state:{1}.| Please cancel the proposition first with '!cancel proposal:{0}'. Check '!help delete' for more information.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key

tuv.seg: That Proposal:{0} has been marked for deletion. It will be garbage collected in a near future. In the meanwhile, it is no more accessible.
The Proposition identifier specified with the Delete Command is invalid.
Only Proposals or Demands can be deleted. Check '!help delete' for more information.

tu.note: Message confirming a successful demand creation.| {0}: dynamically generated demand key

tuv.seg: The following listing will confirm your Demand Reference:{0}... You can send "!help" for more options afterwards.
The identifier specified with the Demand Command is invalid. Your proposed update did not happen.

tu.note: {0}: demand key {1}: demand state

tuv.seg: The Demand reference:{0} is not in a modifiable state ({1}). Your proposed update did not happen.

tu.note: {0}: demand key {1}: given hashtag

tuv.seg: The hash tag (#) concept is reserved for a future feature. For now, the value you gave is ignored.| Add it to the list of demand tags with \u0022action:demand reference:{0} +tag:{1}\u0022| Join the Twetailer community to get more details.
You have no Demand matching the specified identifier.
You have no Proposition matching the specified identifier.

tu.note: Message informing that no result can be displayed for the !list command.

tuv.seg: No Active Demand can be listed.

tu.note: Message introducing the series of messages to be sent in response to a !list command.| {0}: number of messages to be sent

tuv.seg: This message is followed by {0} other(s) - one per Active Demand...
The identifier specified with the Propose Command is invalid. Your sumbitted update did not happen.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key {1}: proposal state

tuv.seg: The Proposition proposal:{0} is not in a modifiable state ({1}). Your submitted update did not happen.

tu.note: Message confirming a successful proposal creation.| {0}: dynamically generated proposal key

tuv.seg: Listing your proposition for Proposition proposal:{0}... You can send "!help" for more options afterwards.

tu.note: {0}: proposal key {1}: given hashtag

tuv.seg: The hash tag (#) concept is reserved for a future feature. For now, the value you gave is ignored.| Add it to the list of proposal tags with \u0022action:propose proposal:{0} +tag:{1}\u0022| Join the Twetailer community to get more details.
Your tag list is now empty. You cannot receive notifications about demands in your area anymore.

tu.note: {0}: unique tag
{0}: list of tags, separated by a blank space {1}: list size
Inform the consumer the demand should have at least one tag.| {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: Your Demand reference:{0} should have at least one Tag.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the expiration date should be in the future.| {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: Your Demand reference:{0} should have its Expiration date in the future.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the range is too small.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given distance| {2}: system limit

tuv.seg: The Range ({1}km) for the Demand reference:{0} is too small. It should be greater than {2}km.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the range is too big.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given distance| {2}: system limit

tuv.seg: The Range ({1} km) for the Demand reference:{0} is too big. Twetailer offers its services only on Earth for now.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the range is too small.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given distance| {2}: system limit

tuv.seg: The Range ({1} mi) for the Demand reference:{0} is too small. It should be greater than {2} miles.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the range is too big.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given distance| {2}: system limit

tuv.seg: The Range ({1} mi) for the Demand reference:{0} is too big. Twetailer offers its services only on Earth for now.

tu.note: Inform the consumer the quantity cannot be 0.| {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: Your Demand reference:{0} should concern at least one item.

tu.note: Inform the consumer that the locale information is missing.| {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: Please update the Demand reference:{0} with your lLocale(postal/zip code and country) - like \u0022ref:{0} locale:12345 us\u0022

tu.note: Inform the consumer that the locale information is invalid.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given postal code| {2}: given country code.

tuv.seg: The Locale \u0022{1} {2}\u0022 given Demand reference:{0} cannot be resolved.| Please provide a valid Locale(postal/zip code and country) - like \u0022ref:{0} locale:12345 us\u0022

tu.note: Inform the consumer that the information for the locale cannot be retrieved.| {0}: demand key

tuv.seg: The Locale information for Demand reference:{0} cannot be retrieved. Please provide them another time (postal/zip code and country).

tu.note: Inform a sale associate about a new demand.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given tags, separated by a space| {2}: expiration date, ISO formatted

tuv.seg: Can you serve Demand reference:{0} with the Tags: {1}? The Expiration date is: {2}.

tu.note: Inform a sale associate about a new demand.| {0}: demand key| {1}: given tags, separated by a space| {2}: expiration date, ISO formatted| {3}: quantity

tuv.seg: I have Demand ref:{0}, for tags:{1}, quantity:{3} which expires:{2}? Please complete and send the following proposal if you have matching supply ... | \u0022d twetailer !propose ref:{0} product:[enter full product name here] price:[enter retail price here] total:[enter final price including all taxes and service fees]\u0022 | Otherwise, please reply with \u0022d twetailer !decline ref:{0}\u0022

tu.note: Inform the sale associate the proposal should have at least one tag.| {0}: proposal key:

tuv.seg: Your Proposition proposal:{0} should have at least one Tag.

tu.note: Inform the sale associate the quantity cannot be 0.| {0}: proposal key

tuv.seg: Your Proposition proposal:{0} should concern at least one item.

tu.note: Inform the sale associate a unit price or the total price is required.| {0}: proposal key

tuv.seg: Your Proposition proposal:{0} should have a unit retail Price and the Total cost which includes all taxes and service fees.

tu.note: Inform the sale associate the demand reference is missing.| {0}: proposal key

tuv.seg: Your Proposition proposal:{0} should reference a Demand (with reference:[id]).

tu.note: Inform the sale associate that the given reference is invalid.| {0}: proposal key| {1}: demand key

tuv.seg: The identification of the Demand (reference:{1}) linked to your Proposition proposal:{0} is invalid.

tu.note: Inform a consumer about a new proposal.| {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal product| {2}: demand key| {3}: demand tags| {4}: demand expiration date| {5}: store key, identifying the place where the sale associate works.| {6}: store name | {7}: currency symbol| {8}: proposed unit price (expected to be unit price)| {9}: proposed total cost (expected to be total cost, taxes included)

tuv.seg: I have a Proposal for your Demand ref:{2} with tags:{3}, expiring:{4} ... | Store:{5}, name:{6} has proposed Proposal:{0} product:{1} price:{7}{8} total:{7}{9} | Send \u0022d twetailer !list store:{5}\u0022 for more details | Please reply with either \u0022d twetailer !confirm proposal:{0}\u0022, or, \u0022d twetailer!decline proposal:{0} \u0022

tu.note: Inform a consumer about a new proposal.| {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal product| {2}: demand key| {3}: demand tags| {4}: demand expiration date| {5}: store key, identifying the place where the sale associate works.| {6}: store name | {7}: currency symbol| {8}: proposed unit price (expected to be unit price)|

tuv.seg: I have a Proposal for your Demand ref:{2} with tags:{3}, expiring:{4} ... | Store:{5}, name:{6} has proposed Proposal:{0} product:{1} price:{7}{8} | Send \u0022d twetailer !list store:{5}\u0022 for more details | Please reply with either \u0022d twetailer !confirm proposal:{0}\u0022, or, \u0022d twetailer!decline proposal:{0} \u0022

tu.note: Inform a consumer about a new proposal.| {0}: proposal key| {1}: proposal product| {2}: demand key| {3}: demand tags| {4}: demand expiration date| {5}: store key, identifying the place where the sale associate works.| {6}: store name | {7}: currency symbol| {8}: proposed total cost (expected to be total cost, taxes included)

tuv.seg: I have a Proposal for your Demand ref:{2} with tags:{3}, expiring:{4} ... | Store:{5}, name:{6} has proposed Proposal:{0} product:{1} total:{7}{8} | Send \u0022d twetailer !list store:{5}\u0022 for more details | Please reply with either \u0022d twetailer !confirm proposal:{0}\u0022, or, \u0022d twetailer!decline proposal:{0} \u0022

tu.note: Inform the sale associate his proposal cannot be submitted to the demand.| {0}: proposal key| {1}: demand key| {2}: demand state

tuv.seg: Your Proposition proposal:{0} cannot be attached to the Demand reference:{1} because it is not in the correct State! (actual Demand State: {2}).

tu.note: Default subject for e-mail sent to end-users
Prefix put in front of e-mail subject when replying to an end-user message

Message generated automatically to demand located with postal code "H0H0H0".| The content is displayed as the "Proposal tags" (see message pp_inform_consumer_about_proposal). IMPORTANT: Accomodate this message to provide a natural sentence ;)

tuv.seg: (not important, this is an automated response ;). Thanks for shopping with Twetailer

tu.note: Message printed in redirection page| {0}: url where the page is going to be redirected towards

tuv.seg:
Redirecting...
Click here to force the redirection.

tu.note: Name of the entire application
Message printed while the application dependencies are loaded, while the console is being built

tuv.seg: Please, wait while the Console is being built...

tu.note: Label of a global command
Label of a global command
Label of a global command
Title of the login form
Informative message printed in the login form
Label of the username field in the login form
Label of the password field in the login form
Label of the Administrator field in the login form
Label of the button/link starting the authentication verification
